author: quintonm
msg: Calls to TurbineResources have been replaced will calls
to getConfiguration().  Unused imports from the change were

author: quintonm
msg: - ExceptionUtils from commons-lang is used to pull the stack trace from an exception
- ExceptionUtils from commons-lang is used to pull the stack trace from an exception
- Uses StringUtils from commons-lang instead of o.a.t.util.StringUtils
- Deprecated methods that have been refactored into commons-lang.  The deprecation tag
has the correct replacement method name.  The deprecated method calls the new method
- Switched from o.a.t.util.StringUtils to the StringUtils from commons-lang
- Now uses SimpleEmail from commons-email instead of o.a.t.util.mail.SimpleEmail
- VelocityEmailException is now thrown instead of MessagingException
- Now used HtmlEmail from commons-email instead of o.a.t.util.mail.HtmlEmail
- VelocityEmailException is now thrown instead of MessagingException
- New exception which is thrown instead of MessagingException from Velocity mail classes.
The following classes from org.apache.turbine.util.mail have been deprecated
This patch was supplied by epugh@upstate.com in patch id#TTWS45

author: quintonm
msg: Unit test and sample job for the Non persistent implementation

author: quintonm
msg: - addJob() is now a static method.
- Replaced reference to TurbineResources with getConfiguration()
- JobEntry objects created during initialization will now set
the jobId on the JobEntry object.
